heroSection.title: Transforming technology within the Department of Defense

textSection.mdMain:
***We're on a mission.***

The Defense Digital Service (DDS) was first established by the Secretary of Defense in November 2015 as a **SWAT team of nerds** to provide the **best in modern technology** to bolster national defense. We bring in talent from **both the private sector and within government** to advance critical DoD initiatives.
textSection.mdCallout: **Doing work that matters by focusing our time and energy on high-priority undertakings.**

iconSection.heading: Who We Are
iconSection.details: We are a SWAT team of nerds that provides the best in modern technical knowledge to bolster national defense.

iconSection.heading: What We Do
iconSection.details: We focus on high-impact projects that advance the DoD's most important initiatives that are critical to the well-being of service members, civilians, and core operations of the Department.

iconSection.heading: Media
iconSection.details: Check out DDS in the news, our latest announcements, our blog, and connect with us on Twitter and LinkedIn.

ctaSection.mdDetails:
**We're focused on hiring the best to serve the best.** 

Interested in proving hoodies, hackers, and nerds have an important role to play in furthering national defense missions?
